title: Define Use Cases for Interactive Education Platform
description: Develop a comprehensive list of use cases and user stories for the interactive educational platform.

title: Design the Architecture of the Interactive Education Platform
description: Create a technical design for the platform that takes into account the use cases and user stories.
dependencies: Define Use Cases for Interactive Education Platform

title: Develop Frontend Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the interactive educational platform, focusing on usability and immersion.
dependencies: Design the Architecture of the Interactive Education Platform

title: Develop Backend Services for the Platform
description: Create the backend services required to support the interactive educational platform.
dependencies: Design the Architecture of the Interactive Education Platform

title: Implement Database Design for User Data Management
description: Design and implement a database schema for storing user data and analytics.
dependencies: Design the Architecture of the Interactive Education Platform

title: Develop AR Experience for the Platform
description: Implement the augmented reality features that make up the core interactive learning experience.
dependencies: Design the Architecture of the Interactive Education Platform

title: Conduct QA Testing on the Interactive Education Platform
description: Perform comprehensive testing on the platform to ensure it functions correctly and meets user needs.
dependencies: Develop AR Experience for the Platform

title: Review and Update RFC for Interactive Education Platform
description: Revise the RFC (Request for Comments) document based on feedback and make necessary updates.
dependencies: Define Use Cases for Interactive Education Platform
